title: Part F
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that net exports will increase and/or does not explain that this is because the country’s goods will be relatively cheaper than foreign goods.
The response states that net exports will increase and explains that this is because the country’s goods will be relatively cheaper than foreign goods.
